definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
to welcome sb with a smiling face (idiom)

sentences.english: The waitress beamed a cheerful welcome to the guests.
sentences.chinese: 女服务员对宾客笑脸相迎。

sentences.english: Everyone you meet deserves to be greeted with a smile.
sentences.chinese: 遇到的每个人都值得你笑脸相迎。

sentences.english: That everyone you meet deserves to be greeted with a smile.
sentences.chinese: 每一个与你相遇的人都值得你笑脸相迎。

sentences.english: But this time folks seemed uber smiley, warm and friendly.
sentences.chinese: 但是这次，人们似乎笑脸相迎，温暖和友好。

sentences.english: The landlady is a nice person who greets all her customers with a smile.
sentences.chinese: 客气的人，对每个客人都笑脸相迎。
那位女售货员笑脸相迎。

definition: eyes bright and full of expression
variant of 臉型|脸型, shape of face/physiognomy
sharp image/clear-cut/in bold outline/in sharp relief
five sense organs of TCM (nose, eyes, lips, tongue, ears 鼻目口舌耳)/facial features
Fangzheng county in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang
